question: 後
sourceAnswer:
<read>あと</read>:: behind/rear | after/later | remainder/the-rest | more-(e.g.-five-more-minutes)/left | also/in-addition | descendant/successor/heir | after-one's-death | past/previous
<read>ご</read>:: after
userAnswer:

<read>ご</read> <tag>suff:</tag> after | in/from-now
